docs.abstract: The complete statement from Dr. Tyson, who has accused Mr. Fairfax, the lieutenant governor of Virginia, of sexually assaulting her in 2004.
docs.snippet: The complete statement from Dr. Tyson, who has accused Mr. Fairfax, the lieutenant governor of Virginia, of sexually assaulting her in 2004.
docs.lead_paragraph: Vanessa C. Tyson, who has accused Lt. Gov. Justin E. Fairfax of Virginia of sexually assaulting her at the 2004 Democratic National Convention in Boston, released a statement on Wednesday describing her account of their encounter. Mr. Fairfax has denied the allegations. Read the full story here.

headline.main: Vanessa Tyson’s Full Statement on Justin Fairfax

docs.abstract: Gov. Ralph Northam, a Democrat, defied calls from his own party to resign over the photo. He has denied that he is pictured in it.
